Title: The Act of Killing
Overview: Filmmakers expose the horrifying mass executions of accused communists in Indonesia and those who are celebrated in their country for perpetrating the crime.
Tagline: A story of killers who win, and the society they build.
production_companies: Spring Films, Final Cut for Real, Piraya Film A/S, Novaya Zemlya
Cast: Anwar Congo, Herman Koto, Syamsul Arifin
clean_text: act kill filmmaker expose horrifying mass execution accuse communist indonesia celebrate country perpetrate crime story killer win society build documentary joshua oppenheimer anwar congo herman koto syamsul arifin 2012
